Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Acidocin J1132 (natural AMPs; two-chain class 2b bacteriocins; Gram-positive bacteria, prokaryotes; UCLL2a)
Sequence Information.Source: Lactobacillus acidophilusJCM 1132;  human microbiota:gut, symbiont bacteria

Literature Information.Literature: A two-chain antimicrobial peptide. Warning: Only partial sequence is available. So far, the only difference between chain a and chain b is that there is an additional Gly at the N-terminus of chain b.
Literature Information.Author: Tahara T, Oshimura M, Umezawa C, Kanatani K.1996
Literature Information.Title: Isolation, partial characterization, and mode of action of Acidocin J1132, a two-component bacteriocin produced by Lactobacillus acidophilus JCM 1132.
